oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diary of William Luther Bigelow Lawrence of Nashville
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The William Luther Bigelow Lawrence diary was written during the years 1854-1888. During the Civil War years, he writes frequently and with detail of the impact of the war on him and his family.
William Luther Bigelow Lawrence was a lawyer in Nashville before the Civil War.
